overview: 'Foo Fighters - Guardian Angels' is the first DVD documentary to chart the swift rise of this phenomenal band and its charismatic front man. Tracing their roots to the Washington DC punk scene of the mid 1980s, when Dave Grohl drummed in a series of locally successful hardcore bands, through his days in Nirvana and the tragic death of Kurt Cobain, via his struggles with the Nirvana legacy and onto the huge success of the Foo Fighters today. This documentary goes behind-the-scenes to reveal the truth about this extraordinary band.
title: Foo Fighters: Guardian Angels
